about_the_game:
This game is a 3D rendered story game that lets you choose your path in every story. Read through pages of fun chapters that fit your mood, from romance to suspense! Lots of new stories to enjoy.

This game will bring a unique and fun twist to choose your own story adventures. Whether you're an avid reader of drama, comedy, fantasy, young adult, romance, girlfriend, or even a gamer, you’ll love this story game! Your love journey begins!

There are currently 20 different stories to enjoy!
There are some minigames for a change. Mini games are optional.

content_descriptors.notes: The game graphically depicts sex. This game is for ADULTS only. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

name: Sexy Milf Stories

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 720
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
